member.name: T:MyMath.Tests.MatrixTests
member.summary: Contains unit tests for the class.

member.name: M:MyMath.Tests.MatrixTests.Divide_PositiveMatrix_ReturnsCorrectResult
member.summary: Tests that dividing a matrix with positive integers by a positive number returns the expected result.

member.name: M:MyMath.Tests.MatrixTests.Divide_ByZero_PrintsMessageAndReturnsNull
member.summary: Tests that dividing a matrix by zero prints a message and returns null.

member.name: M:MyMath.Tests.MatrixTests.Divide_NullMatrix_ReturnsNull
member.summary: Tests that passing a null matrix returns null.
